title: Has Judge Marta Cavanaugh ruled against the parents of her son, Christine Blassie-Ford?
subtitle: The right-wing sites created a cynical (and blatantly inaccurate) conspiracy theory about a woman who accused Brett Cavanaugh of sexual assault.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In the 1996 pinned-down case, Judge Marta Cavanaugh handed down a judgement against Ralph and Paula Blassey, which provided a motive for revenge against their daughter Christine against the son of Judge Cavanaugh Brett, a candidate for the Supreme Court in 2018.
